summary: A woman and her pimp exploit a painter for money.
cast: Michel Simon|Janie Marèse|Georges Flamant|Roger Gaillard|Romain Bouquet|Pierre Desty|Mlle Doryans|Lucien Mancini|Jane Pierson|Christian Argentin|Max Dalban|Jean Gehret|Magdeleine Bérubet|Claude Allain|Ghislaine Autant-Lara|Colette Borelli|Agnès Capri|Marcel Courmes|Henri Guisol|Sylvain Itkine|Olga Nilza|Alexandre Rignault|Viviane Romance
title: La golfa
